coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered: Heart, Liver, Kidney only (organ cost excluded)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Full Cover - No Exclusion - 1,000,000.00; The member is entitled to receive all and any type of outpatient services requested by a treating doctor (whether covered or not covered by the policy) and no approval is required.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Medication Limit Is Equal To Pre-Authorization Approval Limit. Freestyle diabetes screening devices/CGM devices (including related strips/lancets/sensors) covered for diabetic children below 12 yrs (up to SR 7,000/child/year). Transportation of Mortal Remains SR 20,000. Skin Inflammation/redness/viral skin diseases/singulair, Warts, Osteoporosis, Local Injection (in joints) are covered. Varicose Veins (SR 7,000, Elite only). Ambulance for emergencies covered. Organ transplantation (Heart, Liver, Kidney only; excluding organ cost). Life/non-life-threatening congenital illness covered up to annual max. Autism includes speech therapy, rehabilitation, pronunciation. Disability covered up to annual max. General checkup Elite cap SR 5,000 employees, SR 5,000 for husbands/wives. Acute/non-acute psychiatric up to annual max. Blood glucose test strips covered. Road traffic accident (RTA) work/non-work covered, insurer reserves subrogation rights. Artificial fertilization pregnancy (delivery+followup): up to SR 500,000 (Elite 2 cases). Dental: Plasma whitening 2x/yr & diastema closure (Elite & VIP+). Optical benefit includes consultation, hard contact lenses, one frame, antireflection, bifocal, high index & UV. Work related/RTA up to SR 500,000 (Elite). Blood Glucose Monitors/meters 1 device/family up to SR 500. Diabetic strips up to SR 2,000 (Elite). Breathing devices/inhalers 1/family up to SR 600. Optical covers IOL, lenses, contact lenses, VARILUX option, Eye Laser for diabetic retinopathy & detachment. Home doctor visit for Elite. Elective reimbursement (non-emergency) out-of-network in/out KSA not covered (VIP+, VIP only). Companion charges covered as per physician. Full cover no exclusions. Acquired heart valve: up to SR 200,000. Artificial limbs up to annual max.
